name: ABC
text:
Her family was supposed to celebrate at her wedding. Instead, they gathered for her funeral.

The new @abc2020 airs tonight at 9/8c on ABC. https://t.co/eStKEFd936 https://t.co/I3X05ZNvzI

name: ABC
text: "To think that her story and her kind of spirit even after her death is impacting 82 other people like that just brings a smile to my face." https://t.co/PLX0qALnpN

name: ABC
text: Investigation into possible scheme to lobby the Trump administration for a presidential pardon indicates a now-deceased billionaire donated $6 million to support Pres. Trump and promised more, according to documents reviewed by @ABC News. https://t.co/FSvP7Z3qxE

name: ABC
text: Spokesperson for President-elect Joe Biden: “The Supreme Court has decisively and speedily rejected the latest of Donald Trump and his allies’ attacks on the democratic process. This is no surprise.” https://t.co/zvGVayaegd https://t.co/2XXWWHZamv

name: ABC
text: Happy second night of Hanukkah from all of us here at @ABC News! https://t.co/bdy4iAdV9M https://t.co/121rR2U2m1

name: ABC
text: Vatican City’s life-size Nativity scene is revealed next to its Christmas tree. Pope Francis says such symbols of Christmas “are signs of hope, especially in this difficult period." https://t.co/caQo6B6TdO https://t.co/K3k2mLSkEi

name: ABC
text: Several people injured when car was driven into street protest in midtown Manhattan, New York City Police Department says. https://t.co/F8Tch1CmKB
